title: Trouble with loosing account...
body: So I have an account that I had a lot of characters on and additional items, and lost connection going into a match and now it says my user name or password is not valid, and now it just did it with a new account I created because my other one apparently no longer works. Anyone else have this issue before? Submitted a ticket and have not gotten anything back on it.

replies.body: I went ahead and pulled up your account just to be safe, and it looks like there might have been some suspicious activity happening on your account without your knowing. To make sure your account is safe, I'd suggest you hit us up through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as possible!
